summary: AN ORDINANCE creating the Transportation Improvement Fund to provide for transportation related improvements; modifying Chapter 5.76 of the Seattle Municipal Code; authorizing an interfund loan from the West Seattle Freeway Fund to the Transportation Improvement Fund; depositing funds in the Transportation Improvement Fund by appropriation and transfer from the West Seattle Improvement Fund; and making an appropriation from the Transportation Improvement Fund to reimburse a short-term loan from the West Seattle Freeway Fund.
